name: @tpmjs/ticket-categorize
description: Categorizes support tickets by type, priority, and product area

tools.description: Categorizes support tickets by type, priority, and product area. Suggests routing based on category and identifies urgent issues requiring immediate attention.

parameters.name: ticket
parameters.description: Support ticket with subject, description, and optional metadata

returns.description: Categorization with type, priority, product area, routing suggestion, and reasoning

aiAgent.useCase: Use this tool to automate support ticket triage, route tickets to the right team, prioritize urgent issues, and improve support efficiency.
aiAgent.limitations: Categorization is keyword-based. For complex tickets, consider AI-powered classification. Routing suggestions are generic and should be customized to your organization.
examples: Route tickets to appropriate support teams
